api.key_failed_notice:
**⚠️ Your OpenAI API key failed a moderation check.**

This usually means your account does not have active billing or is temporarily rate-limited.

Please check your [OpenAI Billing Dashboard](https://platform.openai.com/account/billing/overview) to ensure your account has payment info and at least $5 in credits.

Once that is resolved, your key will automatically start working again - no need to re-add it.

key_validation.billing_required: Din API-nøgle virkede ikke. Det skyldes sandsynligvis, at din organisation ikke har tilføjet nogen kredit til sin OpenAI-konto. Selvom moderationsmodellen er gratis, kræver OpenAI, at konti har gyldige betalingsoplysninger registreret. For at tilføje kredit, besøg siden [OpenAI Billing Overview](https://platform.openai.com/account/billing/overview) og køb mindst $5 i kreditter. Når du har tilføjet en betalingsmetode og kredit, skulle din API-nøgle fungere korrekt.
